footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Chongyun | Update Date: 02/27/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: The Unforged, Skyward Pride, Serpent Spine, Lithic Blade, Akuoumaru, Sacrificial Greatsword, Mailed Flower, Beacon of the Reed Sea

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet> CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Spirit Blade - Cloud-Parting Star
**2)** Elemental Skill: Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost
**3)** Normal Attack: Demonbane

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Emblem of Severed Fate provides the highest personal damage by a very small margin over 4-piece Noblesse Oblige, and if not hyper-invested, loses out in general team DPS. If paired with Sacrificial Greatsword, he risks having too much Energy Recharge for his 40 Energy Elemental Burst, so the other sets are recommended instead.

Lavawalker is niche and generally resin-inefficent, but will perform somewhere between 4-piece Noblesse Oblige and Emblem of Severed Fate. (Only in teams where he has Pyro aura to Melt off.)

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Chongyun | Update Date: 02/27/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Sacrificial Greatsword, Favonius Greatsword, Makhaira Aquamarine

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet> CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
1) Elemental Burst: Spirit Blade - Cloud-Parting Star
2) Elemental Skill: Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost
3) Normal Attack: Demonbane

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Your talents do not have to be leveled for this build. Offensive stats are not extremely important but if running Noblesse Oblige set, Energy Recharge is needed to burst consistently. Team mates such as Bennett may already use the set, and if so, Energy Recharge can be ignored too.
